title: A novel neutralizing monoclonal antibody targeting the N-terminal domain of the MERS-CoV spike protein
body:
Correction to:
Emerging Microbes & Infections (2017) 6, e37; doi:10.1038/emi.2017.18; published online 24 May 2017

The authors apologize for an error in the first affiliation. The original affiliation ‘School of Laboratory Medicine and Life Science and Key Laboratory of Medical Virology, Wenzhou 325035, China’ should be changed to:

‘School of Laboratory Medicine and Life Science, Institute of Medical Virology, Wenzhou Medical University, Wenzhou 325035, China’.
